quote_first: I sat down on the couch again and looked at my watch It was
quote_last: . I shut my eyes and focused on a spot in my head. My mind a total blank, I gave myself up to the sands of time and let the flow take me wherever it wanted.
title: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman
author: Haruki Murakami

quote_first: At the third stroke it will be
quote_last: … and twenty seconds. ‘Beep … beep … beep.’ Ford Prefect suppressed a little giggle of evil satisfaction, realized that he had no reason to suppress it, and laughed out loud, a wicked laugh.
title: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish
author: Douglas Adams
